Evaluate equity vs. a likely range after a 20-chip flop bet on A-9-3 rainbow with no card to come on the flop yet and facing a bet of 20 into 60.

- My hand: J♥ 7♦ – no pair, no draw, jack-high.
- Board: 3♦ 9♦ A♠ – all my cards are too low to beat any ace, any nine, or even a pocket pair.
- Pot odds: must call 20 to win 80 (25% equity).  
  With jack-high I have <10% equity against Villain’s small blind/continuation-bet range here.

The profitable play is to release the hand.

[Fold]
